messages.text: Hello! I'm here to help you with your orders. What can I do for you?
Can you confirm my latest order was shipped?
Did it ship at the same time as the stand-up meeting?
No. According to the calendar, the stand-up meeting was at 9:00am and your item was shipped at 1:00pm.
Can you schedule a meeting with me and the CEO whenever there is room in their calendar?
Sure! Setting up a meeting now for tomorrow 9:00am with the CEO of MegaDeals and yourself, it will be in your inbox shortly.
